channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trump says Taiwan should pay more for defense and dodges questions if he would defend the island
item.description: Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump demands the self-governed island of Taiwan pay for U.S. protection, dodges the question if he would defend the island from Beijing’s military action, and accuses the island of taking away the semiconductor industry away from the United States.

item.title: After heavy June rains, a buildup of manganese is discoloring a Louisiana city’s water supply
item.description: Unusually high concentrations of the mineral manganese have built up in a northwest Louisiana city’s water supply. The manganese isn’t considered a health hazard.

item.title: The body of a man who rescued his son is found in a West Virginia lake
item.description: Authorities say the body of a man has been recovered from a West Virginia lake after he rescued his son who had gone into the water.
